item.title: Impostor syndrome: What to do after a layoff
item.description: The layoff In the fall of 2022, I decided to take a chance on a high-risk, high-reward startup venture. I felt I was shaking off the limitations of 2022. I had just completed a number of documentation milestones, and I was ready to take on some new challenges as a Content Strategist. Unfortunately, I was hired too early. The first few months I set up content pipelines, version controls, and initial look and feel for our SDK and API documentation.
